bike.description: Full high modulus carbon frame, Dyad Elite lay-up, 130mm travel mp4 suspension, Press Fit 30 bottom bracket, 12 x 142 rear dropouts, 1.5 - 1 1/8" tapered head tube, dropper post routing, high direct mount front derailleur, asymmetrical chainstays, stainless steel chain stay protector, cartridge bearing pivots, Rock Shox Monarch RL High Volume shock, 10mm hardware, replaceable derailleur hanger, Rock Shox Maxle axle

components.description: Rock Shox Sektor Silver TK 650B, Solo Air spring compression, lever actuated lockout, 15mm axle, tapered alloy steerer, external rebound adjust, 130mm travel
FSA Orbit 1.5 Zero-Stack internal cup, for tapered head tube, 30mm shim stack
WTB ST i19 TCS 650B, Tubeless, 32H, eyeleted, with Formula 15mm front and 12x142mm rear sealed bearing 6-bolt disc hubs, stainless spokes
SRAM X7 rear and X7 HDM dual pull front
Avid Elixir 5 hydraulic disc brakes with 180mm front & 160mm rear HS1 rotors
Crank Brothers Iodine 1, 720mm x 30mm rise, 6JAMIS_DEGREE sweep
